tweets.text: The landfill is literally taking over our lives in this town. Time for the @EnvAgency @MattHancock @BorisJohnson to shut the cesspit & we can all move on @Cap_it_off @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/t1r7Vj29WO

Are you frightened to open your windows @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @RedIndustries2 because we are. 2.5 miles from the STENCH HOLE #walleysquarrey at this time of night with air purifier and fan on, I am terrified to expose myself to this poison @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk

To everyone except those responsible for managing the smelly landfill I live near:

Sorry that 50% of my tweets this year have been about hydrogen sulphide... it‚Äôs been deeply unpleasant. I‚Äôll talk more astro in future to make up for it...

Hope you have a nice, odour-free day ü§™

tweets.text: @GreenpeaceUK can you help the residents of Newcastle Under Lyme? Our air is toxic thanks to #walleysquarry landfill. The air is full of H2S. Record numbers of complaints to the @EnvAgency  and still it's allowed to poison us. #stopthestink #cleanair

@ELF_Law can you help us? Newcastle Under Lyme is full of toxic H2S gas (202ppb) thanks to #walleysquarry landfill. The @EnvAgency are not acting with urgency about the record numbers of complaints. This is an emergency. People are suffering physically and mentally

#stopthestink
